---
title: Wikiapp Docs
---

Welcome to the documentation for Wikiapp!

This library will let you get random Wikipedia page excerpts in any language.

```bash
wikiapp/notebooks on  main [!+?] via ⨁ v1.4.550 via 🅒 wikiapp:dev 
❯ pixi run program
✨ Pixi task (program in default): python wikiapp/console.py
2010 AFC Futsal Championship
The 2010 AFC Futsal Championship was held in Tashkent, Uzbekistan from
23 to 30 May 2010.

wikiapp/notebooks on  main [!+?] via ⨁ v1.4.550 via 🅒 wikiapp:dev took 2s 
❯ pixi run program --language fr
✨ Pixi task (program in default): python wikiapp/console.py --language fr
Route 247 (Québec)
La route 247 (R-247) est une route régionale québécoise située sur la
rive sud du fleuve Saint-Laurent. Elle dessert la région
administrative de l'Estrie.

wikiapp/notebooks on  main [!+?] via ⨁ v1.4.550 via 🅒 wikiapp:dev 
❯ pixi run program -l es
✨ Pixi task (program in default): python wikiapp/console.py -l es
Miguel Ángel Losada
Miguel Ángel Losada Rodríguez fue un ingeniero civil español,
catedrático de Ingeniería Civil de la Universidad de Granada. Premio
Nacional de Ingeniería Civil en 2018.
```
